--- layout: page title: Demosthenes permalink: /person-index/demosthenes exclude: true ---
Δημοσθένης
Birth year: 384 BC
Death year: 322 BC
  • PAA: 318625
  • Wikidata: Q117253
  • TLG: urn:cite:perseus:author.466.1
Legal Roles:
  • Plaintiff in: Demosthenes against Aphobus for financial loss
  • Plaintiff in: Suit for ejectment by Demosthenes against Onetor
  • Plaintiff in: Demosthenes against Aeschines for accepting bribes
  • Plaintiff in: Demosthenes against Meidias for hubris
  • Plaintiff in: Prosecutors against Demosthenes for treason
  • Plaintiff in: Lycurgus and Demosthenes against Aristogeiton for illegally exercising citizenship rights
Speaking Roles:
  • Speaker of: Dem 19
  • Speaker of: Dem 21
  • Speaker of: Dem 36
  • Speaker of: Dem 18
  • Speaker of: Dem 27
  • Speaker of: Dem 20
  • Speaker of: Dem 31
  • Speaker of: Dem 28
  • Speaker of: Dem 29
  • Speaker of: Dem 30
